name: Prototype (RTS / Pikmin)
description:
A prototype I made as an assignment for my master's degree. Real Time Strategy game with Pikmin mechanics.

  • Units are spawned by bringing items (instead of mining resources). The more units carry an item the faster they’ll be able to move it.
  • The goal is to clear all enemies and bring the big item to the spawner.

Controls:

  • Left Click: select units
  • Right Click: give orders…
    • on enemy units/walls to attack
    • on items to carry them
    • anywhere else to move
  • WASD: move camera around
  • Scroll wheel: zoom camera in/out
  • F11: toggle full screen
  • P: debug function to spawn one ally unit

More details about other game elements in the .pdf
